titleStmt.title: A letter to a member of the convocation of the University of Oxford containing the case of a late fellow elect of University-College in that University.
titleStmt.author: C. U. (Charles Usher), b. 1674 or 5.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and to be sold by John Nutt ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Charles Usher by Halket and Laing.
